sentences.english: Eventually it puts forward the focus of studying V-based solid solution type hydrogen stora…
sentences.chinese: 指出了今后钒基固溶体型贮氢材料应用研究的重点。

sentences.english: Eventually it puts forward the focus of studying V-based solid solution type hydrogen storage material in further.
sentences.chinese: 指出了今后钒基固溶体型贮氢材料应用研究的重点。

sentences.english: The results show that Cu solubilizes in W and the substitutional solid solution is formed.
sentences.chinese: 结果发现，铜固溶在钨中，并形成了置换固溶体。

sentences.english: It can also be strengthened by solid alloying for its partial metallic bonds.
sentences.chinese: 由于其含有金属键，也可以采用固溶体合金化。

sentences.english: Manganese goes into solid solution and then it forms a separate constituent.
sentences.chinese: 锰溶入固溶体，然后形成游离的组员。

sentences.english: A hard supersaturated solid solution of iron characterized by an acicular (needle-like) microstructure.
sentences.chinese: 一种以针尖状微观结构为特征的铁的硬饱和的固溶体。

sentences.english: Preparation, characterization and three-way catalytic performance of ceria-zirconia solid solution;
sentences.chinese: 对铈锆固溶体制备方法的研究进展进行了总结和评述。

sentences.english: The research progress of the approaches for the preparation of ceria-zirconia solid solutions is reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 对铈锆固溶体制备方法的研究进展进行了总结和评述。

definition: crystal lattice (the regular 3-dimensional pattern formed by atoms in a crystal)
